scripts.build:choo: browserify -e node_modules/choo/index.js -g unassertify -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -s Choo -o choo.js
scripts.build:html: browserify node_modules/bel/index.js -g unassertify -g uglifyify -p bundle-collapser/plugin -s html -o html.js
scripts.build: npm run build:choo && npm run build:html
